Title: Bound to You
Description:
I haven't worked with Shandris long, but... It's unusual for her to act like that.

But it doesn't matter.

While she deals with... logistics, you and I should go ahead and find a way to cleanse these stones.

Maybe Shae'lune knows what to do next.
ObjectivesText: Ask Shae'lune about the cleansing the stones.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Meet Lilian back at the Haven Cascades camp

Objectives.Text: Ask Cyanthesa to cleanse the stones
